module.name: winpeimagereader
module.short: Contains a resource reader for PE image files

descr.p: This unit contains , a TAbstractResourceReader descendant that is able to read Microsoft Windows PE image files (executables, dynamic link libraries and so on).
Adding this unit to a program's uses clause registers class with TResources.
This class provides a reader for Microsoft Windows PE image files containing resources.
PE is the file format used by Microsoft Windows executables, dynamic link libraries and so on.
descr.remark: This reader can only read full PE images, not COFF object files. Use TCoffResourceReader instead.
